name: QuestionnaireCCARSOverallRecoveryRating
title: Questionnaire CCARS Overall Recovery Rating
description: Extent to which a person is involved in the process of getting better and developing/restoring/maintaining a positive and meaningful sense of self.

concept.display: Views self positively with the knowledge that setbacks may occur and is able to actively pursue and access resources to support recovery with a sense of empowerment and hopefulness about future outcomes
Hopeful about future outcomes and is actively participating and using resources to promote recovery
Expresses hopefulness about future outcomes and is willing to begin to engage in using available resources to promote recovery
Expresses a mixture of hopefulness and hopelessness about future outcomes and is interested in discussing available options and resources to aid in recovery
Entrenched in symptoms, expresses hopelessness about future outcomes AND does not actively engage in using available resources that might promote recovery
